pest_control.title: Pest Control
pest_control.description: The tavern keeper is having trouble with goblins in the nearby caves. Help clear them out.
pest_control.completion_text: Thank you! The roads are much safer now. Here's your reward.

gathering_pelts.title: Gathering Pelts
gathering_pelts.description: The merchant needs wolf pelts for his trade routes. Bring him some pelts from the dangerous creatures.
gathering_pelts.completion_text: Excellent pelts! These will fetch a good price. Here's your payment and a bonus potion.

security_patrol.title: Security Patrol
security_patrol.description: The town guard needs help patrolling the dangerous areas. Eliminate bandit threats.
security_patrol.completion_text: Outstanding work, citizen! The roads are safer thanks to you. Accept this sword as a token of our gratitude.

lost_treasure.title: Lost Treasure
lost_treasure.description: A villager has lost precious family heirlooms. Help explore the dangerous areas to find them.
lost_treasure.completion_text: You found it! This dagger has been in my family for generations. I can't thank you enough!

apprentice_trial.title: Apprentice Trial
apprentice_trial.description: Prove your worth as an adventurer by completing a series of challenges.
apprentice_trial.completion_text: Well done! You've proven yourself worthy. Take this armor - you'll need it for the challenges ahead.

spider_extermination.title: The Spider Menace
spider_extermination.description: Giant spiders have been terrorizing travelers. Clear out their nest in the spider woods.
spider_extermination.completion_text: The roads are much safer now! The spider threat has been neutralized thanks to your bravery.

crystal_harvest.title: Crystal Expedition
crystal_harvest.description: The wizard needs rare crystals for his research. Venture into the dangerous crystal caves.
crystal_harvest.completion_text: Excellent work! These crystals will advance my research significantly. Your contribution to magical knowledge is appreciated.

undead_uprising.title: Rise of the Undead
undead_uprising.description: Undead creatures are rising from the cemetery. Find the source and stop it.

objectives.description: Use 2 holy water to purify the area

undead_uprising.completion_text: The divine light has cleansed this unholy corruption. The dead can now rest in peace.

dragon_awakening.title: The Dragon's Awakening
dragon_awakening.description: A young dragon has been spotted near the mountains. This threat must be dealt with before it grows stronger.

objectives.description: Retrieve a dragon scale as proof

dragon_awakening.completion_text: Incredible! You've slain a dragon! This deed will be remembered for generations. You are truly a legendary hero.

fey_diplomacy.title: Fey Court Relations
fey_diplomacy.description: The fey creatures are causing mischief. Establish peaceful relations through diplomacy or force.

objectives.description: Obtain a fey flower as a peace offering
Deliver the flower to the pixie queen

fey_diplomacy.completion_text: Well done! The fey now see mortals in a more favorable light. Nature is in balance once again.

merchant_troubles.title: Merchant Protection
merchant_troubles.description: Bandits have been attacking trade caravans. Escort the merchant safely to his destination.
merchant_troubles.completion_text: Thank you for keeping the trade routes safe! Commerce can flourish thanks to heroes like you.

elemental_balance.title: Elemental Imbalance
elemental_balance.description: The elemental planes are in chaos. Restore balance by dealing with rogue elementals.
elemental_balance.completion_text: The elements are in harmony once more. Your intervention has prevented a catastrophic imbalance.

vampire_hunt.title: Night Stalker
vampire_hunt.description: A vampire lord has been preying on the innocent. Track down this creature of the night.
vampire_hunt.completion_text: The darkness has been lifted! The vampire's reign of terror is over, and the night is safe once more.

demon_incursion.title: Hellish Invasion
demon_incursion.description: Demons are breaking through from the lower planes. Seal the portals before it's too late.
demon_incursion.completion_text: The portals are sealed! You've saved our realm from demonic invasion. The forces of hell have been repelled.

celestial_blessing.title: Divine Intervention
celestial_blessing.description: The gods seek a mortal champion. Prove your worth to earn divine blessing.
celestial_blessing.completion_text: You have proven yourself worthy of divine favor. The gods smile upon you, champion.

labyrinth_challenge.title: The Minotaur's Maze
labyrinth_challenge.description: An ancient labyrinth holds treasure and danger in equal measure. Navigate its twisting paths.

objectives.description: Reach the center of the labyrinth

labyrinth_challenge.completion_text: You've conquered the ancient labyrinth! Few have managed such a feat. The maze holds no more secrets from you.

phoenix_rebirth.title: Cycle of Fire
phoenix_rebirth.description: A phoenix's rebirth cycle has been disrupted. Help restore the natural order.

objectives.description: Help the phoenix complete its rebirth

phoenix_rebirth.completion_text: The phoenix's cycle is restored! The eternal flame burns bright once more, bringing renewal to the land.

beholder_terror.title: The All-Seeing Eye
beholder_terror.description: A beholder has taken residence in the caverns, its alien intelligence threatening reality itself.
beholder_terror.completion_text: Reality stabilizes as the beholder's influence fades. The cosmos is safe from aberrant corruption.

kraken_depths.title: Terror of the Deep
kraken_depths.description: A kraken threatens all sea travel. Brave the ocean depths to face this legendary monster.
kraken_depths.completion_text: The seas are free! Your legendary battle with the kraken will be sung about for ages to come.

world_tree_pilgrimage.title: Journey to the World Tree
world_tree_pilgrimage.description: Seek the wisdom of the World Tree, the ancient source of all life and knowledge.
world_tree_pilgrimage.completion_text: The World Tree has shared its ancient wisdom with you. You are now connected to the eternal cycle of life.

void_anomaly.title: Void Corruption
void_anomaly.description: Reality is being consumed by void energies. Stabilize the dimensional barriers.
void_anomaly.completion_text: The void anomaly is contained! Reality remains stable thanks to your intervention.

time_paradox.title: Temporal Disturbance
time_paradox.description: Time itself is fracturing. Use time crystals to repair the temporal flow.

objectives.description: Place crystals at the time altar

time_paradox.completion_text: Time flows normally once again. The timeline is secure and paradoxes have been resolved.

soul_liberation.title: Prison of Souls
soul_liberation.description: Countless souls are trapped in cursed gems. Free them from their eternal prison.

objectives.description: Free the souls at the liberation altar

soul_liberation.completion_text: The souls are free at last! Their grateful spirits bless you as they ascend to their eternal rest.

ultimate_wish.title: The Final Wish
ultimate_wish.description: Legends speak of a coin that grants a single wish. Find it and decide the fate of the world.

objectives.description: Make your choice at the wish altar

ultimate_wish.completion_text: Your wish echoes through reality itself. You have shaped the very fabric of existence. The world is forever changed.
